titles.title: Providing for consideration of the resolution (H. Res. 571) expressing the sense of the House of Representatives that the deployment of United States forces in Iraq be terminated immediately and providing for consideration of the concurrent resolution (H. Con. Res. 308) directing the Clerk of the House of Representatives to make a technical correction in the enrollment of H.R. 3058.

Providing for consideration of the resolution (H. Res. 571) expressing the sense of the House of Representatives that the deployment of United States forces in Iraq be terminated immediately and providing for consideration of the concurrent resolution (H. Con. Res. 308) directing the Clerk of the House of Representatives to make a technical correction in the enrollment of H.R. 3058.

action.text: The House Committee on Rules reported an original measure, H. Rept. 109-312, by Mr. Gingrey.
Sec. 2. Upon adoption of this resolution, House Concurrent Resolution is hereby adopted.

calendar.text: Placed on the House Calendar, Calendar No. 126.

action.text: DEBATE - The House proceeded with one hour of debate on H. Res. 572.
DEBATE - The House resumed debate on H. Res. 572.
The previous question was ordered without objection.

vote.text: On agreeing to the resolution Agreed to by the Yeas and Nays: 210 - 202 (Roll no. 607).

action.text: Motion to reconsider laid on the table Agreed to without objection.

bill.summary:
(This measure has not been amended since it was introduced. The summary of that version is repeated here.)
Sets forth the rule for consideration of H. Res. 571 (expressing the sense of the House of Representatives that the deployment of U.S. forces in Iraq be terminated immediately, and providing for consideration of H. Con. Res. 308 directing the Clerk of the House to make a technical correction in the enrollment of H. R. 3058).
